text: Chuvapputhaalam is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Babu Radhakrishnan. http://spicyonion.com/title/chuvappu-thaalam-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Abhilasha * Jagathy Sreekumar * Sreenivasan * Jagannadha Varma * Kuthiravattam Pappu * Shivaji * VK Sreeraman * Alex * Kavara Sasankan * Devika ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
